Нацеленность на саморазвитие в выбранной: Commitment to self-development in the chosen field, including continuous learning
Имеется опыт разработки с использованием: Experience in development with Angular(2+) and RxJS
Разработка и поддержка UI-приложения (до: Development and maintenance of a UI application (adding new features, updating dependencies)
Рефакторинг кода, устранение codeSmells: Refactoring code, fixing code smells and other issues identified by SonarQube
Разработка Unit и e2e тестов фронтенд ча: Development of unit and e2e tests for the frontend
Разрабатываемое приложение относится к с: The developed application pertains to the fintech sector (for JSC 'AlfaBank'). It is built based on a microservices architecture;
Основная используемая технология — Реакт: The main technology used is React, along with NodeJS;
В сфере ответственности имеются модули,: The scope of responsibility includes modules written in both class-based and functional approaches;
В качестве стейт-менеджера — используетс: RTK, including RTK Query, is used for state management. Jest and Cypress libraries are used for test development. Modules of the application are connected via WMF (Webpack). There is active use of the Core-components library. Identified vulnerabilities are fixed using AppSec;
В качестве дополнительной нагрузки осуще: Additionally, there is the responsibility of preparing educational presentations on technical topics for newly hired junior specialists.
asist-description1: Development of UI applications with different technologies (React, NextJs, Angular(2+))
asist-description2: An outsourcing company specializing in working with clients from Israel, Europe, and the USA. I improved my English language skills there.
asist-description3: Also, working there I had the opportunity to use a wide range of development tools (Node (Express), React, Next, Angular (with extensive using RxJS)), and to participate in the development of various front-end applications (an application for an eye surgery clinic, a CRM system with extensive functionality for an American client, an online portal for customers and service providers in the entertainment industry…).
Академия Министерства внутренних дел Рес: Academy of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of the Republic of Belarus
Разработка веб-сайтов с использованием H: Website Development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
